title: Ticket #702: condor_tools can't talk to a collector in an HA configuration
description:
With an HA CM configuration, condor_restart is unable to find the collector:

$condor_restart -collector Can't find address for collector host1.fqdn,host2.fqdn Perhaps you need to query another pool.
attachments:
• collector_restart.patch 1126 bytes added by rrati on 2009-Aug-28 20:35:12 UTC.
    This patch will parse a list of hosts running collectors when the tools try to find the host
